Let me provide you with the key scenarios:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 1. <strong>Product/Service Defect:</strong> If the product or service you received is defective or does not meet the described specifications, you are generally eligible for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 2. <strong>Cancellation within Grace Period:</strong> If you change your mind within the specified grace period, you can typically request a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 3. <strong>Unauthorized Charges:</strong> If you notice any charges on your account that you did not authorize, we will investigate and assist you in the refund process.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 4. <strong>Event Cancellation:</strong> If an event you purchased tickets for is canceled and not rescheduled, you may be eligible for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 5. <strong>Duplicate Charges:</strong> If you have been charged multiple times for the same item or service, please inform us immediately so that we can rectify the situation and issue a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 6. <strong>Non-receipt of Goods:</strong> If you have not received the product or service within the expected time frame, you may qualify for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

| I try to see in which cases can I request to be refunded                                   | REFUND       | check_refund_policy      | I genuinely appreciate your interest in understanding the situations where you can request a refund. Let's dive into it together! Here are some common scenarios in which you may be eligible for a refund:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 1. <strong>Product/Service Quality:</strong> If you find that the product or service you purchased does not meet your expectations or is of poor quality, you may have grounds for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 2. <strong>Cancellation within the Grace Period:</strong> If you change your mind and decide to cancel your purchase within the specified grace period, a refund can often be arranged.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 3. <strong>Order Not Delivered:</strong> If your order does not arrive within the expected timeframe or is lost during transit, you may qualify for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 4. <strong>Unauthorized Charges:</strong> If you notice any unfamiliar or unauthorized charges on your account, it's important to bring them to our attention. We will investigate and assist you accordingly.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 5. <strong>Event Cancellation:</strong> In the unfortunate event of a canceled event without a rescheduled date, you may be entitled to a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 6. <strong>Duplicate Charges:</strong> If you have been charged multiple times for the same item or service, please inform us so that we can rectify the situation promptly.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | Please note that these are general situations, and specific refund policies may vary depending on the vendor or service provider. | need to see in what situations can i ask to be refunded                                    | REFUND       | check_refund_policy      | I'm on it! I completely understand your need to know the situations in which you can request a refund. Here are some common scenarios:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 1. <strong>Product/Service Defect:</strong> If you receive a product or service that has a defect or does not match the description provided, you typically have grounds to request a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 2. <strong>Cancellation within Grace Period:</strong> If you change your mind about a purchase and cancel it within the specified grace period, you are often eligible for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 3. <strong>Unauthorized Charges:</strong> If you notice any charges on your account that you did not authorize or recognize, we will investigate the matter and assist you in securing a refund, if necessary.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 4. <strong>Event Cancellation:</strong> In the unfortunate event that an event you have purchased tickets for gets canceled and is not rescheduled, you would typically be entitled to a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 5. <strong>Duplicate Charges:</strong> If you are charged multiple times for the same item or service, please notify us immediately so that we can rectify the situation and process a refund if applicable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 6. <strong>Non-receipt of Goods:</strong> If you do not receive your ordered product within the expected timeframe, you may be eligible for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | Please note that specific refund policies may vary among different vendors or service providers. It's always a good practice to review the terms and conditions or contact the specific vendor for more details on their refund policy. If you have any specific questions or concerns regarding a particular purchase, please provide me with the necessary details, such as the {{Order Number}} or other relevant information, and I'll be glad to assist you further.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |

| show me in which situations can i request my money back                                    | REFUND       | check_refund_policy      | Positively! |                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 1. <strong>Product/Service Defect:</strong> If the product or service you purchased has a defect or doesn't meet the description, you typically have the right to request a refund and get your money back.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 2. <strong>Cancellation within Grace Period:</strong> If you change your mind and decide to cancel your purchase within the specified grace period, you should be eligible for a refund and receive your money back.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 4. <strong>Event Cancellation:</strong> If you bought tickets for an event that gets canceled and a rescheduled date is not provided, you are usually entitled to a refund and will receive your money back.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 5. <strong>Duplicate Charges:</strong> If you have been charged multiple times for the same product or service, please inform us as soon as possible. We will rectify the situation and ensure that you get your money back.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 6. <strong>Non-receipt of Goods:</strong> If you haven't received the product you ordered within the expected delivery time frame, please let us know. |                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

|                                                                                            |              |                          | 2. <strong>Order Cancellation:</strong> If you change your mind and decide to cancel your order within the specified timeframe, you should be able to receive a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 3. <strong>Unauthorized Charges:</strong> If you notice unauthorized charges on your account or credit card statement, please let us know immediately. We will investigate the charges and assist you with a refund if necessary.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 4. <strong>Delivery Issues:</strong> If your order is not delivered on time or fails to arrive altogether, you may be eligible for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 5. <strong>Event Cancellation:</strong> If you purchased tickets for an event that gets canceled, you should typically be entitled to a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 6. <strong>Duplicate Charges:</strong> If you are accidentally charged multiple times for the same item or service, please reach out to us. We will address the issue promptly and process a refund if needed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | Remember that refund policies may vary depending on the specific vendor or service provider. It's always a good idea to review the terms and conditions or contact the seller directly for more information on their refund policy. If you have any specific questions or concerns about a recent purchase, please provide me with the relevant details, such as the order number, so I can assist you further. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're here to help in any way we can.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

|                                                                                            |              |                          | 1. <strong>Product/Service Non-Delivery:</strong> If you have made a purchase but haven't received the product or service within the expected time frame, you usually have the right to ask for a refund.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

|                                                                                            |              |                          | 5. <strong>Event Cancellation:</strong> If you had purchased tickets for an event that got canceled or postponed, you may be eligible for a refund. However, specific refund policies may vary depending on the event or ticket vendor.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                            |              |                          | 6. <strong>Duplicate or Overcharged Payments:</strong> If you notice that you have been charged multiple times for the same product or service or if you have been overcharged, please contact our customer support. We will rectify the payment discrepancy and process the refund if necessary.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                            |              |                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
